name: The Solar Games
blurb: A solar kart racing game incorporating real locales, solar physics, a comedic attitude, and a positive social impact worldwide.

rewards.reward: No Reward

YOCTOWATT\r\n==============================\r\n2 copies of the game, your choice of a mobile version (iOS or Android) and a PC (PC, Mac, or Linux) version, access to all Kickstarter Backer Exclusive Google Hangouts with the development team, and a digital wallpaper for your PC!
ZEPTOWATT\r\n==============================\r\nYOCTOWATT + Enjoy the music of The Solar Games on your own audio device with the digital soundtrack of the game!
ATTOWATT\r\n==============================\r\nZEPTOWATT + 1 extra in-game garage space to store an extra kart and 500 Solar Cash to upgrade your kart!
FEMTOWATT\r\n==============================\r\nATTOWATT + 25 extra inventory slots to store kart parts!
PICOWATT\r\n==============================\r\nFEMTOWATT + Play the game before anyone else with early Beta access!  At this level your name will be included in the credits!

NANOWATT
==============================
PICOWATT + A handmade bracelet made by a Haitian artist exclusively for The Solar Games! 
==============================
ONLY AVAILABLE AT THE NANOWATT LEVEL.
MICROWATT\r\n==============================\r\nPICOWATT + Get a second kart to start the game with on release day!

DIGITAL ART PACKAGE\r\n==============================\r\nMICROWATT + Four beautiful digital high resolution lithographs from The Solar Games for you to use as desktop backgrounds or to print and hang in your home or office!

DIGITAL NOVELLA\r\n==============================\r\nDIGITAL ART PACKAGE + Get a digital download of The Solar Games novella written by Annie Craton!  The novella tells the story of The Solar Games.  The text will also contain music, video, and imagery that relates to the story of The Solar Games.
SOLARWATT\r\n==============================\r\nDIGITAL NOVELLA + A Kickstarter exclusive in-game helmet showing off your Kickstarter prowess!
MILLIWATT LEVEL - COMEDIC COMMENTARY\r\n==============================\r\nSOLARWATT + 5 in-game comedic audio tracks to use starting on the release day of The Solar Games!
MILLIWATT - EXCLUSIVE MUSIC\r\n==============================\r\nMICROWATT + 5 in-game artist music tracks to use starting on the release day of The Solar Games!

WATT\r\n==============================\r\nMILLIWATT (Your choice of COMEDIC COMMENTARY or EXCLUSIVE MUSIC) + The Solar Games t-shirt and a Kickstarter exclusive in-game kart shell showing off even more of your Kickstarter prowess!
DUAL MILLIWATT\r\n==============================\r\nWATT, except you get both the COMEDIC COMMENTARY and EXCLUSIVE MUSIC audio packs.

FOUNDER ACCOUNT\r\n==============================\r\nDUAL MILLIWATT + An invitation to join the ranks of the most exclusive club at The Solar Games: The Founder's Club!  This gets you exclusive access to the in-game Founder's Badge, 500 Solar Cash each month for a year, and you will receive every game created by goodXgames for FREE for the next 10 years!

KILOWATT\r\n==============================\r\nFOUNDER ACCOUNT + A Kickstarter exclusive in-game Haitian voodoo mask helmet and a 1.8 watt clip on backpack solar charger!  You can charge your phone or any other small electronic device with the power of the SUN!

MEGAWATT\r\n==============================\r\nKILOWATT + Get one of your ideas in the game: design a helmet to be sold in our in-game marketplace!  Get your in-game credit bumped up to a designer's credit! Plus get your digital helmet for free!
1.21 GIGAWATTS\r\n==============================\r\nMEGAWATT + A Kickstarter exclusive Haitian artist art piece featuring The Solar Games logo!

TERAWATT\r\n==============================\r\n1.21 GIGAWATTS + Our coolest physical reward!  Four beautiful lithograph prints from The Solar Games for you to hang in your home and show off to your family and friends!

PETAWATT\r\n==============================\r\nTERAWATT + Designers get ready!  Work with our art team one-on-one to design your own kart shell and racer helmet!  You get your shell and helmet for free! Plus you will see your artwork featured in our in-game marketplace! And of course you still get a design credit!

EXAWATT
==============================
PETAWATT + A Kickstarter exclusive beautifully crafted papier-mâché mask made exclusively for The Solar Games by a Haitian artist!  A digital version will be created for your in-game use!
============================== ONLY AVAILABLE AT THE NANOWATT LEVEL.

ZETTAWATT\r\n==============================\r\nEXAWATT + An invite to join the team during The Solar Games Official Launch Party.  While here in Orlando you get to take a tour of the office and enjoy your own Q&A with the team!  You must be at least 21 years old and able to arrange travel to and lodging in Orlando, FL.

YOTTAWATT\r\n==============================\r\nZETTAWATT + You get to work alongside The Solar Games art team to create your own racer from the ground up!  Design your own kart, bobblehead helmet, and shell!  Plus you will see your artwork featured in our in-game marketplace!   You get all of your designs in-game for free! And of course you still get a design credit!

SOLAR DEITY
==============================
YOU HAVE UNLOCKED THE POWER OF RA
==============================
YOTTAWATT + Design an exclusive track for you, your company, or brand!  The track will be featured in our in-game marketplace! You get access to the track for free! Additionally your design credit will be upgraded to SOLAR DEITY!
